mapper.select: SELECT u.id , u.name , u.login_ID , u.frozen , u.unfreezing_time FROM t_user u, t_merchant_information m, t_merchant_waiter w WHERE w.user_id = u.id and w.merchant_id = m.id and u.deleted = '0' and m.deleted = '0' and w.deleted = '0' and w.merchant_id = #{merchantId} order by w.create_time desc
